body:
Comment 3 by **jasaugusto**: 
Many Thankx Alex,

I just installed the 386 zip installer in this box (also a 10 yr old
Windows 2000 installation :-) but with a intel processor (I think its
a 2.4 GHz Pentium 4) and the error doesn't appear.

Meanwhile I started trying to compile Go1.1 from the sources in mingw,
but there were errors. I'll try to figure out what is happening ASAP.
